title: Get the automatic messages for a Business Account

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: A short-term access token authorized by the TikTok Business Account owner. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok Business Account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: auto_message_type
parameters.description: The type of automatic message. Enum values: WELCOME_MESSAGE : welcome message. A welcome message is a message that is automatically sent to a user when they start a direct message conversation with you. Each Business Account can have up to one welcome message. SUGGESTED_QUESTION : suggested question. A suggested question is a frequently asked question displayed at the beginning of a chat. When the user selects a suggested question, the user will automatically receive the corresponding preset answer. Each Business Account can have up to three suggested questions. CHAT_PROMPT : chat prompt. A chat prompt is an interactive button displayed above the input box. When users tap a chat prompt, the system will automatically generate a corresponding question for users to start the conversation. Each Business Account can have up to six chat prompts.

parameters.name: auto_message_id
parameters.description: The ID of the automatic message.

fields.name: business_id
fields.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok Business Account.

fields.name: operation_status
fields.description: The status of the automatic message. Enum values: ENABLE : The automatic message is turned on. DISABLE : The automatic message is turned off. If you want to turn on or turn off an automatic message, use /business/message/auto_message/status/update/ .

fields.name: auto_message_id
fields.description: The ID of the automatic message.

fields.name: auto_message_type
fields.description: The type of automatic message. Enum values: WELCOME_MESSAGE : welcome message. A welcome message is a message that is automatically sent to a user when they start a direct message conversation with you. SUGGESTED_QUESTION : suggested question. A suggested question is a frequently asked question displayed at the beginning of a chat. When the user selects a suggested question, the user will automatically receive the corresponding preset answer. CHAT_PROMPT : chat prompt. A chat prompt is an interactive button displayed above the input box. When users tap a chat prompt, the system will automatically generate a corresponding question for users to start the conversation.

fields.name: audit_status
fields.description: The review status of the automatic message. Enum values: REVIEWING : The automatic message is pending review. APPROVED : The automatic message has been approved. REJECTED : The automatic message has been rejected. Note : If the audit_status of the automatic message is REJECTED , you cannot update the automatic message by using /business/message/auto_message/status/update/ . If audit_status of the message is REVIEWING , you need to wait for some time before rechecking the review status. The exact waiting time may vary depending on the content and other factors, but normally ranges from a few seconds to 2-3 hours.

fields.name: welcome_message
fields.description: Returned only when auto_message_type is WELCOME_MESSAGE . Information about the welcome message.

fields.name: content
fields.description:
The text of the welcome message. Note : If you enable the welcome message for a Business Account for the first time, the default welcome message will be: "Hi there,
Thanks for contacting {{display_name}}! Feel free to ask a question here or leave us a message and we'll get back to you shortly.

Thank you!"

fields.name: suggested_question
fields.description: Returned only when auto_message_type is SUGGESTED_QUESTION . Information about the suggested question.

fields.name: question
fields.description: A frequently asked question to help users start a conversation.

fields.name: answer
fields.description: The preset answer that will be automatically sent when a user selects the question.

fields.name: chat_prompt
fields.description: Returned only when auto_message_type is CHAT_PROMPT . Information about the chat prompt.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The name of the prompt button that is displayed above the input box.

fields.name: content
fields.description: The corresponding question for the prompt that the system automatically generates for users to start the conversation when users tap the chat prompt.
